hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa’eed said:“Whenever the Prophet (ﷺ) ate, he would say: Al-hamdu lillahil-ladhi at’amana wa saqana wa ja’alana Muslimin (Praise is to Allah Who has fed us, given us to drink, and made us Muslims).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقَالُ إِذَا فَرَغَ مِنَ الطَّعَامِ
chapter.eng-name: What is to be said when one has finished eating
